content.text: {"version": 1, "meta": {"strategy": "rule", "model": "claude-sonnet-4-20250514", "created_at": "2024-01-15T11:45:00Z"}, "ops": [{"op": "replace_line", "line": 7, "text": "Senior data engineer w/ expertise in Python, SQL, & cloud platforms including AWS & GCP.", "current_snippet": "Data engineer with experience in various technologies.", "why": "Highlight cloud platforms & languages matching job"}, {"op": "insert_after", "line": 16, "text": "• Designed ETL pipelines processing 10TB+ daily data volumes", "current_snippet": "• Built data processing systems", "why": "Quantify scale to demonstrate big data capability"}, {"op": "replace_range", "start": 28, "end": 29, "text": "• Apache Spark, Kafka, Airflow, dbt\n• AWS (S3, Redshift, EMR), GCP (BigQuery, Dataflow)", "current_snippet": "• Python, SQL, NoSQL\n• Cloud technologies", "why": "Specify big data & cloud tools per requirements"}]}
